name: review_files
description: Submit an initial assessment of a Pull Request, including optional general observations and a list of files requiring detailed review. Only provide feedback that adds significant value.

status.description: Overall status of the PR based on initial assessment

summary.description: Brief explanation of the initial assessment

comment.description: Specific aspect or observation that needs addressing

tag.description: The category of observation being made

observations.description: A list of general comments about the structure and style of the code changes

filename.description: Full path and name of the file to review

changes.description: Concise summary of the substantive changes made to this file in the PR

related_changes.description: Brief description of related changes in other files or relevant context that impacts the review of this file

reason.description: Specific rationale for why this file needs careful review, focusing on significant implementation issues, security concerns, or major architectural changes
